evidence.text:
Person B: I WANT YOU for this show. So we'll organize around whatever mother, brother, fucking sick dog or rabbit you need to take care of.
Person B: Gorgeous and with a pure heart. People are gonna LOVE that!
Person A: You'll open it at home. It's French. My wife swears by it! Oops! I've got to run! But come and visit whenever you like! We'll always be happy to see you!

Person A: I need you to come back.
Person A: Aaaaahh, there's   she is!!! Where have you been??!   We wanted to all have a drink for   your departure - something big to   mark the occasion.
Person A: I couldn't believe MY EARS!

Person A: You can't actually be living in ... ..ELISABETH SPARKLE'S APARTMENT??!
Person A: It's too much of a coincidence! I sack her and BAM! Here she is again trying to stick her foot right back in the door!
Person B: Uh...yes we...we briefly met when she was moving out of town... she asked me if I was looking for a place to rent... which I was so... there you have it.

Person B: Ratings are through the roof.
Person B: That's why we've decided we want you to host... THE NEW YEAR'S EVE
Person B: ...network's biggest show! 50 million viewers... LIVE. You can't get any higher ...
Person B: Anyway, I'm taking a huge gamble on you and these men can tell you I talked you up to the shareholders `til my last drop of saliva, convincing them this is the way to go. It's going to be intense. We have only a few months to pull it off, but I know we can do it. So? What do you say?

Person A: I'll meet you there!
Person B: Let me introduce you to the shareholders! They've been dying to meet you!
